Package dao

package dao
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    This is the super class AbstractDAO that has methods for every DAO in the project.
    ClientDAO
    The ClientDAO class contains methods specific to client-related operations, such as findById and insert.
    OrderDAO
    The OrderDAO class is similar to ClientDAO and ProductDAO but includes its own specialized methods and more complex queries specifically designed for managing orders.
    ProductDAO
    The ProductDAO class contains methods specific to product-related operations, such as findById and insert.
